price:
71. Qofkii toobad keena oo sama fala, wuxuu hubaal u soo laaban (oo toobad 
keeni) xagga Alle laabasho (towbad) wanaagsan.
arabic: وَمَن تَابَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَإِنَّهُۥ يَتُوبُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَتَابٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waman tāba waʿamila ṣāliḥan fa-innahu yatūbu ilā al-lahi matāban
